Sandbox	https://sandbox.secure.checkout.visa.com/wallet-services-web/xo/button.png
                    LIVE	https://secure.checkout.visa.com/wallet-services-web/xo/button.png

You can either specify size to display a standard size button, or you can specify height and width to specify a custom size. If you do not specify size or both height and width, the button size is 213 pixels. If you specify height or width, the value of size is ignored
                    154 - small
                    213 - medium (default)
                    425 - High resolution or large

Override value for brands associated with card art to be displayed. If a brand matching the consumer's preferred card is specified, the card art is displayed on the button; otherwise, a generic button is displayed
                    Select multiple ire required
                    VISA
                    MASTERCARD
                    AMEX
                    DISCOVER

Width of the button, in pixels, You must specify the width if you specify a value for height
                    -less than 477 if height is 34; default value is 154
                    -greater than 212 and less than 659 if height is 47; default value is 213
                    -greater than 424 and less than 1317 if height is 94; default value is 425

Whether a Verified by Visa (VbV) consumer authentication prompt is suppressed for this transaction. If true, VbV authentication is performed only when it is possible to do so without the consumer prompt.
                    true - Do not display a consumer prompt.
                    false - Allow a consumer prompt
